body:
Hi Mostapha!  LOVE Ladybug + Honeybee- well done!  

Wondering - how can I specify an analysis time period for Honeybee Solar Radiation study?  I'm assuming I could use the Ladybug "Analysis Period" tool?  But how and where do I connect this to the existing Solar Radiation honeybee definition?



THANK YOU!
topic: HOW to specify a time period for Honeybee Solar Radiation study?
